body:
Thanks for stopping by my Github page.

I'm a postdoctoral fellow at UC Berkeley and one of the co-founders of [rOpenSci](http://ropensci.org), a project aimed at developing tools to facilitate open, reproducible, and transparent science. You can check out our organizational page [here](https://github.com/ropensci/)

## Elsewhere
* I blog at [Inundata](http://inundata.org/)
* Twitter: [@_inundata](http://twitter.com/_inundata)
* [work page](http://nature.berkeley.edu/~kram)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Karthik Ram
